blog15.text: This is a blog about whatever I feel like writing about and it is actually the first post on this site believe it of not. I'm pretty excited about this post because its going on the site and all. This is really just some filler text so the first posts look pretty long and it will give me the chance to figure out if I need to keep the entire posts from displaying all at once. Maybe I could write a word counter or something that would break the text from all showing at once and then they have to be clicked on and from there they will open in a new page with the correct nav and social media icons but the article in full is shown.

blog14.text: This is another blog post thats going up on the site. it is actually the second post on the site but i guess technically it should be the second newest since the newest blogs really go up front but that's okay because this is just another test post.
